name: The Stairs (markthomas007)
description:
The stairs. 

One of the most hardest things to do.
And now you can do it.
From the comfort of your chair.
Control both legs. Put one foot infront of the other and get down the stairs.
But be careful. One wrong step will send you falling down the stairs.

This game includes 2 stairs for you to try to walk down.
And 4 characters that you can be. One of them unlocked when completing both levels.
